amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for an automatic continuing appropriations process in the event that a regular appropriations bill or joint resolution making continuing appropriations for a fiscal year has not been enacted into law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-566 to provide for an automatic continuing resolution in the event that an agreement is not reached on spending levels by the legal deadline.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 304 (Roll no. 309).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 304 (Roll no. 309).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
